author: ledger75
content:
I am a full stack, smart contract engineer.
Smart contract: Rust(Substrate, Soroban), Solidity, Func, Move, Python and Golang
Chains: Solana, EVM, Algorand, Ton, Steller, Near, Cosmos, ICP and Bitcoin
Off chain relayer: Web3, Chainlink, Helius
Front-End: React,React Native, Vue, Next.js, Svelte, CMS 
Back-End: Nest.js, Node/Express.js, Django
